title: Rainforest Adventure Tour
description: Explore the lush El Yunque rainforest with guided hiking, waterfall swimming, and local lunch included.

title: Authentic Mofongo Experience
description: Taste Puerto Rico's most beloved dish prepared by master chefs using traditional family recipes.
fullDescription: Taste Puerto Rico's most beloved dish prepared by master chefs using traditional family recipes. Experience the authentic flavors of the island in the heart of historic Old San Juan. Our mofongo is made fresh daily with the finest ingredients and served with your choice of protein.
